Questions.QuestionString: When the captain calls the attendant. (Level 1)
Answers: a low chime and blue light comes on.
a high/low chime and pink light comes on.
a high chime and pink light comes on.

Questions.QuestionString: Attendant call is achieved by pressing a button on the passenger service unit (PSU). To reset the light. (Level 1)
Answers: a reset switch on the attendants panel is operated.

Questions.QuestionString: Cabin assistance when activated from the toilet. (Level 1)
Answers: activates a high chime and an amber light.
activates a high / low chime and a blue light.
activates a musical fanfare and a red light.

Questions.QuestionString: The lavatory door can be unlock (Level 2)

Questions.QuestionString: The side stick armrest of Captain and First Officer seats. (Level 2)
Answers: Possible to lift it vertically and stow it behind the backrest
Located on the inboard side of the seat
Possible to adjust the height and the tilt angle of the side stick armrest

Questions.QuestionString: The Passenger Service/Information Units (PSIUs). (Level 2)
Answers: Has two primary units: Passenger Service Unit (PSU) and Passenger Information Unit (PIU). The Passenger Service Unit (PSU), installed above each seat row
The Passenger Information Unit (PIU), installed above each second seat row

Questions.QuestionString: The inflatable assembly is made of? (level 2)

Answers: the girt bar does not connects the inflatable assembly to the floor attach fittings.
the girt bar connects the inflatable assembly to the floor attach fittings.
the girt bar connects to the floor attach fittings.

Questions.QuestionString: What's statement correct? (level 1)
Answers: The EASA OPS 1 requires a safety belt with shoulder harness for each flight crew seat and for any seat alongside a pilots seat
The EASA OPS 1 does not requires a safety belt with shoulder harness for each flight crew seat and for any seat alongside a pilots seat
The EASA OPS 1 does not requires a safety belt with shoulder harness for each flight crew seat and passenger seat
